Mailing Address: c/o The Kelowna Women's ShelterPO Box 20193RPO Towne CentreKelowna, BC     V1Y 9H2
Service Details: Provides free, safe and confidential services for women, 18 years and older, who have experienced abuse in relationshipsOffers drop-in support groups:  - Wed, afternoon and evening: drop in support groups; please call for additional information; childcare is usually available for the afternoon group (please call ahead to arrange)- Tue, afternoon: for women who require longer term support in dealing with relationship abuse issues- Nurturing Mothers Group: by registration only; please call for additional information
